item.title: Karnataka to Upgrade Healthcare Infrastructure in Raichur District
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur: The Karnataka government has planned a major upgrade of healthcare infrastructure in Raichur district, including the construction of a district hospital in Lingsugur and an MCH (Maternal and Child Health) hospital in Devadurga, said Health and Family Welfare Minister Dinesh Gundu Rao.
The minister was speaking at the inauguration of Mega Health Camp 2025 in Manvi town on Saturday.
The camp, organized in collaboration with the National Health Mission, district administration, Raichur I...]]>
item.author: Gururaj A Paniyadi, About The Author, Principal Correspondent With Deccan Chronicle, Specializes In Covering Coastal, North Karnataka Districts. His Expertise Lies In Political Analysis, He Holds A Profound Interest In Human Interest Stories, History, Culture. Offering Extensive Coverage, Gururaj Explores Various Facets, Including Politics
